CamTCC1149.Transcription:
Whanne bloweþ þe bromþanne wogeþ þe
                    gromwhanne bloweþ þe fursþanne wogeþ
                    wurs
CamTCC1149.Note:
Written as prose, first of a collection of Latin and French proverbs,
                    some with English equivalents.
CamTCC1149.Editions:
Förster,  Max. 
             “Frühmittelenglische Sprichwörter.” 
             Englische Studien
         31 (1902): 1-20: 5.
Sisam,  Celia,  and  Kenneth Sisam, eds.  
             The Oxford Book of Medieval English Verse.
         Oxford: Clarendon, 1970: 559.
